text: I’m at Shorthand, which has some overlap with Ceros, though it’s specifically aimed at writers — i.e. it’s no-code and no-web-design. We were originally a longform journalism tool, though have been picked up by comms and marketing teams in a bunch of other verticals. (Not selling or pushing Shorthand at all btw! Totally depends on your requirements and resourcing). <http://Shorthand.com|Shorthand.com>.
